name: Capitalist
description:
Ancient lineage fate is in your hands! In this free game, your mission is to return the family's wealth and become a real capitalist.
  Earn gold to buy different amplifiers! Not enough coins? Drop in to the game every day to receive gifts and gold awards!
  You will find many levels, and in each - for more missions! Do you want to break the gems or collect magical relics? I like short mini-rounds or long game levels? The capitalist, each player will find exactly what he likes!
  The greatest heights you reach, the more difficult it becomes the job! Apply all his strength to break through the chain of stone squares and other obstacles!
